newsitem.title: USA: American Phoenix names Redett chairman.
newsitem.headline: American Phoenix names Redett chairman.

text.p: American Phoenix Group Inc, which is implementing a name change to TAL Wireless Networks Inc, said Tuesday it appointed Richard Redett as chairman and John Vargo as president and chief executive officer.
The company said the changes were the first step in a restructuring.

Redett joined the company in April 1996 and was formerly the company's chief financial officer, secretary and director. The company did not say who Redett replaced and no one was immediately available for comment.
The company said Vargo replaces John Davis, who remains on the company's board of directors. Vargo will be nominated to a position on the board of directors in the future.
